approveSRRByCommitment(uint256,bytes32,s.details: Approves the given commitment hash to transfer the SRR

params.historyMetadataDigest: string of the history metadata digest

cancelSRRCommitment(uint256).details: Cancels the current commitment of a given SRR

createSRR(bool,address,bytes32,(bytes32,.details: Creates a registryRecord of an artwork

params.isPrimaryIssuer: boolean whether the user is a primary issuer

createSRRFromLicensedUser(bool,address,b.details: Creates a registryRecord of an artwork from LicensedUserLogic contract

params.isPrimaryIssuer: address of the issuer user contract

getLicensedUserWalletFactoryAddress().details: Gets the endpoint address of LicensedUserWalletFactory

getNameRegistryAddress().details: Gets the endpoint address of NameRegistry

getSRR(uint256).details: Gets the registryRecord related with the tokenId

getSRRCommitment(uint256).details: Gets the given commitment hash to transfer the SRR

getSRROwner(uint256).details: Gets the current owner address given the token ID

getStartrailRegistryAddress().details: Gets the endpoint address of StartrailRegistry

initialize(address,string,string,bytes32.details: Initializes the address of the StartrailRegistry contract

params.URIPostfix: string of the URI postfix of the scheme
params.URIPrefix: string of the URI prefix of the scheme where SRR metadata is saved
params.schemaURIIntegrityDigest: bytes32 of the URI digest of the scheme

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setNameRegistryAddress(address).details: Sets the addresses of the reference

setTokenURIParts(string,string).details: Sets the URI info of the scheme where SRR metadata is saved

params.URIPostfix: string of the URI postfix of the scheme
params.URIPrefix: string of the URI prefix of the scheme

setTokenURISchemaIntegrityDigest(bytes32.details: Sets the scheme URI digests of SRR metadata

params.digest: bytes32 of the scheme URI digests

tokenURI(string).details: Gets URI where the matadata is saved

tokenURIIntegrity(uint256).details: Gets the metadata digests of SRR and hash

tokenURISchemaIntegrity(uint256).details: Gets the scheme digests and hash

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferSRRByReveal(address,bytes32,uint.details: Transfers the ownership of a given SRR ID to another address.

params.reveal: bytes32 of the reveal hash value to restore the commitment value
params.tokenId: uint256 ID of the SRR to be transferred

params.isPrimaryIssuer: boolean whether the user is a primary issuer
